title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, garam masala, cumin, chili powder, lemon juice, and salt. Let it sit for at least 1 hour.
Grill, pan-sear, or bake the marinated chicken chunks until lightly charred and cooked through. Set aside.
